sentences.en: A thunderous burst of fireworks shattered the air.
sentences.cn: 于是火光一亮,鞭炮突然响起来.
米德大夫的眉头皱得要发火了.

sentences.en: His speech was greeted with thunderous applause .
sentences.cn: 他的演讲赢得雷鸣般的掌声。

sentences.en: It'spilled to the floor with a thunderous sound.
Naturally, it couldn't be the thunderous din of mosquitoes.
She made her entry to the sound of thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 她在雷鸣般的掌声中上了场。

sentences.en: The audience broke out into thunderous cheers.
The audience burst into thunderous applause.
The audience responded with thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 观众报以雷鸣般的掌声。

sentences.en: The glad tidings gave rise to thunderous cheers.
The stillness was rent by thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 雷鸣般掌声打破了寂静.

sentences.en: The tree fell with a thunderous crash.
sentences.cn: 那棵树轰隆一声倒下了.

sentences.en: The unique spaceship climbed straight into the blue sky after a thunderous lift - off from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.cn: 这艘独特的宇宙飞船在轰鸣声中从卡纳维拉尔角起飞了,直冲蓝天.

sentences.en: Their academic and adventure reports aroused thunderous applauses.
sentences.cn: 他们的学术报告和探险报告,时时激起如雷的掌声.

sentences.en: They greeted him with thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 他们以雷鸣般的掌声欢迎他。
雷鸣般的隆隆声冲击着潜艇的外壳.

words.tran_cn: 如雷鸣的；非常的；异乎寻常的
打雷；发出雷鸣般声响；大声吼叫（thunder的ing形式）
像打雷的，隆轰隆响的；多雷的，强有力的

trans.tran_cn: 雷鸣般的，多雷的，雷动，山响
trans.tran_en: If you describe a noise as thunderous, you mean that it is very loud and deep
